bioAsHtml: Geoffrey De Smet (Red Hat) is the lead and founder of OptaPlanner (http://www.optaplanner.org), an open source planning engine in Java. Before joining Red Hat in 2010, he was formerly employed as a Java consultant, an A.I. researcher and an enterprise application project lead. He has contributed to many open source projects. Since he started OptaPlanner in 2006, he’s been passionately addicted to planning optimization.
